eeka eekige aathmarthakamikama...hithanna oyatajiwithe waraduna...ee kiyanne kollek athin wenna thiyana de wuna...waradakari hagimak oyage jiwitheathi...marenna hithenawa athi...ehemath nathnam oyata kisi ganak nathiwa athi...mamalassanayi...mata salli thiyanawa...mama igena gena thiyanawa...ithin kollo kiyak ekkahitiyath mokada...me loke kollo nathuwayi...ayi un kiyala bo palada.arawa mewa godaknidahasata hethu karagena oya oya gana maha lokuwata hithan athi...eekanam waradi kelle...kohomahari dan wenna thiyana de wela...neda.ehenam danwath rawatenne nathiwa imu...samanallu ganaawadhanayen imu...mokada ra watunu wale mokatada hadda dawal watenne..neda.eka deyak...oyade wuna kiyala oya awasanawanthiyakwath oya kalakanni kellakwath newe...mokada mama dannawaoya oyage kollath ekka inna aththe uta aththatama aadare nisa...uu oyata aththatama aadarenokalata...aththatama aadare karapu nisa hamadema ee pujasane uda puja karanna athi...poruwak udatauuth ekkama naginna hina mawanna athi...eeth bariwenna athi...ee athithe...mewarthamane...oya yanna ooni anagatheta...neda.ehenam ahanna...kanen newe oya raththaranhithen ahanna...oyage jiwithe lassana karaganna lassana hithak oya hitha langata enakambalaporoththuwen inna...rawatennepa..awadhanayen inna...yalu wenna kalin aashrayakaranna..moakada tharuna kale kiyanne waradim wena kale..eeth ee waradim walata oya wandigewanne jiwithe ee langa kale...samanya widihata jiwithe gewanna...hithannepa...giya degiya...aapahu hadaganna ba...kadunu de salli dila hadaganiwi oya...eeth waradakarihagimak thiyeyi oyata boruwak kara kiyala mulu jiwitha kalema....epa boru karannakawadawath..aththa ma kiyanna...jiwitheta wassanaya eddin niyan kale salakunakwaththiyagannepa....wassanayata aththa kiyanna..wassanaya wahi kandulu salawi...eeth oyawa aadarenthurul kara ganiwi...ballo asse me loke bodhisathwayo innawa...oya eeka amathakakarannepa...wassane sithale dawatenna...oyage jiwithe nawum weyi....me ahanna...payak dawasak sathiyak masayak hari kamakna...athithe kiyala iwara karanna...oya mathaken amathaka karanna bariweyi...eeth mathaka nokarainna...wisheshayenma kawadawath eya issaraha menna me dewal nam kiyannepa...“mata kawadawath mama aadare karapu kenagen oyagen tharam aadarayaklabila na...”“matanam ekspiriyans thiyanawani...mama oyawath hadala gannam”mokada kollo kiyanne irisiyawe uparima...eeka oya annawathathi..samaharawita nodannawath athi...meka kiyannama ooni...dan kollek oyata innawa...ehenamayi parana katha...neda.kotinma kiyanawanam...mul kale tikak hithala katha karanna...aayasayakganna weyi...eeth passe oya huruweyi...mokada oyata hambawena kolla oyage athitheta aasanathnam uta ayi oya eeka mathak karanne...neda.habayi thawa kollo wagayak innawa...un oyata mathak karannaidak denne na...un ooka mathak kara kara oyata wada denawa...deyiyange nameta aathwenna..mokada jiwithayak na...waradak wuna thama...eeth oya gaurawaniya kanthawak...oyaminissu ekka giye na...oya giye oyage pemwatha ekka...pemwatha oyawa dala giya eekaoyage waradak newe...dennepa ekektawath oyage jiwithe baldu karanna..mokada oya manasikaledduth bo pala wenna ba...jiwithe windinna puluwan ekek oya wenuwen kohe hariathi...mama mulinma waradi wechcha ayata kiwe lankawe innakellongen bahutharekata oya de wela nisa....dan kiyannam meka kiyawana oyata...eekiyanne kollek athin ee de wune nathi oyata...deyak kiyannam kelle...ee dekiwwe oya api kunuharapayak kiyana indriyan deka ekathu wena ekanam newe...manasikawashayen bandunu aadareth ekka oya kayika widiyen...ee kiyanne monayam aakarayen hokayika bandimak athi karaganna kalin eyawatherum ganna..mama dannawa oya modiyek newe...eeka nisa iwasimen wada karanna...ekadeyak....ahannako...oya yalu wela inna kolla oyawa aadare namayen rum ekakata ekkayanna hadanawa kiyala hithamu...mama yanna epa kiyanne na...eka oyageyi eyageyi wishwasayamatha wena deyak...poddak oya aadare kiyana ramuwen eliyata awith oya oyage dihayi oyageaadarawanthaya dihayi balanna...nogalapim athi...habayi hadaganna puluwan eewathathi...ithin oyata dan therewi oya oya de karana eka harida waradida kiyala...habayipuluwan tharam ee deyin walakila inna...iskole yana kelleknam oya ee de karannamaepa...awurudu wissen wisi eken passe wagenam kohomath oyata hithewi...kamakna...habayi kalapanawen...mokada hamotama bodhisathwayo hamba wenne naha...therum aranwada karanna...me loke bahutharayak pirimi rawatilikarayo..honda kollekta honda kellekhoyaganna wenne naha...meka kiyawana kollek innawanam mama kiyannam deyak...meahapan...umbaa honda kollek wenna athi...umbaa honda kellek hoyapan...mama kiyanne hithagana...sharire kiyanne kunu wela yana deyak...hitha ehema na...hitha honda ganikawonani...ithin ee gana bayawennepa...umbaata ganikawak set wenne na...eeth kollekathin anatha wechcha kellek umbaata hambawewi...umbaa aadareth karawi...prashnayak nathiwajiwithe geniyanna puluwan kiyala hithenawanam witharak ekith ekka nidaganin....ekisellam baduwak neweyi umbaata mata...me ahapan dan mama umbaata katha karanne...mama dannawa umbaaihe kes ganata kello ekka indala athi..patta wesiyo ekkath budiyala athi...kawadawath
